MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Coaltown of Wemyss. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:24pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to locate the cause of the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
